answer.content:
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Dijkstra's Algorithm Visualization</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            flex-direction: column;
            height: 100vh;
            background-color: #f4f4f4;
        }
        canvas {
            border: 1px solid #000;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        button {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            font-size: 16px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<canvas id="canvas" width="600" height="600"></canvas>
<button id="runAlgorithm">Run Dijkstra's Algorithm</button>

<script>
    // Graph representation
    const graph = {
        A: { B: 1, C: 4 },
        B: { A: 1, C: 2, D: 5 },
        C: { A: 4, B: 2, D: 1 },
        D: { B: 5, C: 1 },
    };

    const nodes = {
        A: { x: 50, y: 100 },
        B: { x: 200, y: 100 },
        C: { x: 200, y: 300 },
        D: { x: 50, y: 300 }
    };

    const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

    function drawGraph() {
        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
        ctx.strokeStyle = 'black';

        // Draw edges
        for (let vertex in graph) {
            for (let neighbor in graph[vertex]) {
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.moveTo(nodes[vertex].x, nodes[vertex].y);
                ctx.lineTo(nodes[neighbor].x, nodes[neighbor].y);
                ctx.stroke();
            }
        }

        // Draw nodes
        for (let vertex in nodes) {
            ctx.fillStyle = 'lightblue';
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(nodes[vertex].x, nodes[vertex].y, 20, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fill();
            ctx.stroke();
            ctx.fillStyle = 'black';
            ctx.fillText(vertex, nodes[vertex].x - 7, nodes[vertex].y + 5);
        }
    }

    async function dijkstra(start) {
        const distances = {};
        const visited = {};
        const previous = {};
        const queue = [];

        for (let vertex in graph) {
            distances[vertex] = Infinity;
            previous[vertex] = null;
            queue.push(vertex);
        }
        distances[start] = 0;

        while (queue.length > 0) {
            // Find the vertex with the smallest distance
            queue.sort((a, b) => distances[a] - distances[b]);
            const current = queue.shift();
            visited[current] = true;

            // Update distances of neighbors
            for (let neighbor in graph[current]) {
                if (!visited[neighbor]) {
                    const distance = distances[current] + graph[current][neighbor];
                    if (distance < distances[neighbor]) {
                        distances[neighbor] = distance;
                        previous[neighbor] = current;
                    }
                }
            }

            // Visualize iteration
            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
            drawGraph();
            // Highlight current node
            ctx.fillStyle = 'orange';
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(nodes[current].x, nodes[current].y, 20, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fill();
            ctx.stroke();
        }

        return { distances, previous };
    }

    document.getElementById('runAlgorithm').addEventListener('click', function() {
        drawGraph();
        dijkstra('A').then(result => {
            console.log('Distances:', result.distances);
            console.log('Previous:', result.previous);
        });
    });

    drawGraph(); // Initial draw
</script>

</body>
</html>

messages.content: Generate a single HTML file with JavaScript demonstrating the user-given concept. Only respond in a single HTML file.
